content: Fix hardcoded scoring weights in linux-optimizer.js (lines 321, 323) - replace with config.get() calls
Fix hardcoded scoring weights in windows-analyst.js (lines 256-259) - replace with config.get() calls
Fix hardcoded scoring weights in migration-plan.js (lines 318-321) - replace with config.get() calls
Fix hardcoded framework path in agent-template.js (line 21) - replace with config.get('paths.framework')
Add missing config-loader import to agent-template.js
Add missing config-loader import to migration-specialist.js
Fix configuration type mismatch for agents.available (expected array, actual object) - false positive in validation script (arrays are objects in JS)
Run test suite to verify all changes work and no regressions introduced
Re-run validation to confirm all critical violations are resolved
